title: Have the following definitions been discussed and confirmed to be understood: System Requirements, High-level requirements, Derived Requirements?
description: Have the following definitions been discussed and confirmed to be understood: System Requirements, High-level requirements, Derived Requirements?

title: Has the terminology used in the requirements definitions been fully defined?
description: Has the terminology used in the requirements definitions been fully defined?

title: Have the systems design and safety requirements been allocated to the hardware?
description: Have the systems design and safety requirements been allocated to the hardware?

title: Do the requirements include applicable standards for the hardware?
description: Do the requirements include applicable standards for the hardware?

title:
Do the requirements include functional and performance requirements, including derived requirements
and stress limits for normal use?
description:
Do the requirements include functional and performance requirements, including derived requirements
and stress limits for normal use?

title:
Do the requirements include reliability and quality requirements, including requirements related to failure
rates, exposure times and design constraints?
description:
Do the requirements include reliability and quality requirements, including requirements related to failure
rates, exposure times and design constraints?

title:
Do the requirements include maintenance and repair requirements throughout the hardware item service
life?
description:
Do the requirements include maintenance and repair requirements throughout the hardware item service
life?

title: Do the requirements include manufacturability and assembly requirements?
description: Do the requirements include manufacturability and assembly requirements?

title: Do the requirements include testability requirements?
description: Do the requirements include testability requirements?

title: Do the requirements include storage and handling requirements?
description: Do the requirements include storage and handling requirements?

title: Do the requirements include installation requirements?
description: Do the requirements include installation requirements?

title: Are the requirements documented in quantitative terms (not describing the design or verification solutions), with tolerances where applicable?
description: Are the requirements documented in quantitative terms (not describing the design or verification solutions), with tolerances where applicable?

title: Is each requirement unambiguous, verifiable, described in complete enough detail for its hierarchical level, and not in conflict with other requirements?
description: Is each requirement unambiguous, verifiable, described in complete enough detail for its hierarchical level, and not in conflict with other requirements?

title: Are the derived requirements consistent with the system requirements or requirements from which they are derived?
description: Are the derived requirements consistent with the system requirements or requirements from which they are derived?

title: Are the requirements consistent with the SSA?
description: Are the requirements consistent with the SSA?

title: Have the derived safety requirements been defined and fed back to the SSA?
description: Have the derived safety requirements been defined and fed back to the SSA?

title: Do the requirements comply with the relevant standards?
description: Do the requirements comply with the relevant standards?

title: Are the  requirements compatible with the capabilities and limitations of available technology?
description: Are the  requirements compatible with the capabilities and limitations of available technology?

title:
Are the performance, temperature range, de-rating
and screening requirements consistent with the safety and reliability requirements?
description:
Are the performance, temperature range, de-rating
and screening requirements consistent with the safety and reliability requirements?

title: Do the requirements address the ability to test, maintain and manufacture the hardware item?
description: Do the requirements address the ability to test, maintain and manufacture the hardware item?

title: Have the software/hardware interface requirements been defined?
description: Have the software/hardware interface requirements been defined?

title: Do the requirements trace upward to the next hierarchical level according to the criteria defined in the plan?
description: Do the requirements trace upward to the next hierarchical level according to the criteria defined in the plan?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the implementation constraints that will not be verified at a higher hierarchical level?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the implementation constraints that will not be verified at a higher hierarchical level?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the error or failure mode detection and correction behavior performed by the IP?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the error or failure mode detection and correction behavior performed by the IP?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the design constraints that control the interaction of the IP with the rest of the custom device design?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the design constraints that control the interaction of the IP with the rest of the custom device design?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the configuration parameters or settings used to alter or limit the function provided by the IP?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the configuration parameters or settings used to alter or limit the function provided by the IP?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the controlling or deactivating unused features or characteristics of the design?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the controlling or deactivating unused features or characteristics of the design?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the design constraints to properly perform implementation and mitigate the use of the IP features, modes, and design characteristics with known failure or limitations?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the design constraints to properly perform implementation and mitigate the use of the IP features, modes, and design characteristics with known failure or limitations?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the behavior of the IP during robustness conditions, boundry conditions, failure conditions, and abnormal inputs and conditions?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the behavior of the IP during robustness conditions, boundry conditions, failure conditions, and abnormal inputs and conditions?

title: Do the derived requirements capture the mitigation of known errata that would adversely affect the correct operation of the IP function?
description: Do the derived requirements capture the mitigation of known errata that would adversely affect the correct operation of the IP function?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all upper level requirements have been considered?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all upper level requirements have been considered?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring applicable standards and guidance have been considered?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring applicable standards and guidance have been considered?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all hardware functions and interfaces are covered?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all hardware functions and interfaces are covered?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the architecture is covered completely?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the architecture is covered completely?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all the hardware implementation requiring verification is adequately specified?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all the hardware implementation requiring verification is adequately specified?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all prohibited behavior characteristics in the safety assessment are covered?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all prohibited behavior characteristics in the safety assessment are covered?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the operating environment is adequately specified?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the operating environment is adequately specified?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all assumptions and constraints are considered?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring all assumptions and constraints are considered?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring this implementation will avoid any known problems with existing or similar hardware?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring this implementation will avoid any known problems with existing or similar hardware?

title: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring there are requirements that cover all the used IP functions and deactivation means for the unused ones (for non-interference with the used functions)?
description: Has the completeness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring there are requirements that cover all the used IP functions and deactivation means for the unused ones (for non-interference with the used functions)?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are in accordance with upper level requirements?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are in accordance with upper level requirements?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are in accordance with the system requirements allocated to the hardware item?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are in accordance with the system requirements allocated to the hardware item?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements state “what” as opposed to “how”?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements state “what” as opposed to “how”?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are unambiguous?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are unambiguous?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements can be realized?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements can be realized?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements can be verified?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements can be verified?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the functioning modes have been defined?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the functioning modes have been defined?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are consistent with the safety assessment?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring the requirements are consistent with the safety assessment?

title: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring assumptions and constraints are correctly identified as derived requirements?
description: Has the correctness of requirements been demonstrated by ensuring assumptions and constraints are correctly identified as derived requirements?

title: Have the abnormal and boundary conditions and associated expected behavior of the design been defined as requirements?
description: Have the abnormal and boundary conditions and associated expected behavior of the design been defined as requirements?

title: Has the HRD been subjected to appropriate change and configuration control (HC1)?
description: Has the HRD been subjected to appropriate change and configuration control (HC1)?
